Reviews.Title: Really poor quality
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I began having trouble with this camera a few days into owning it with it showing video loss periodically. I later noticed that several of the Infared LEDS had burnt out and now it just won't provide a picture at all. The detail is very poor, what more can I say its not worth buying PERIOD.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3-inch Sony CCD Infrared Night Vision Mini Dome Surveillance Camera General Features: White color
Mini dome shape 1/3-inch Sony CCD image sensor Twenty four (24) Infrared night vision LEDs
Infrared Distance: 20 m / 65.6-feet Resolution: 480 TV lines TV System: NTSC Lens: 3.6 mm
Built-in 15-inch cable with BNC video out and power input connectors Power Specifications:
DC 12V, 500mA
ProductInfo.Name: 1/3" Sony CCD 480 Line Color CCTV Infrared Night Vision Mini Dome Surveillance Camera (White)
